summary: A cocky Harvard graduate transports a load of marijuana from Boston to Berkeley, California. His girlfriend gets busted with the second load. He and a friend go against a dirty cop and a Cuban gangster to get the load and the girl back.
cast: Howard Gardner|Robert F. Lyons|Ellen Barber|John Lithgow|Joy Bang|Nancy Belle Fuller|Barbara Hershey|Demond Wilson|Gene Borkan|Herbert Kerr|Ted Williams|Buzzy Linhart|Anitra Walsh|Paul Williams|Charles Durning|Tom Harvey|Victor Junquera|Paul Sorvino|Victor Argo|Hector Elias|Andy Arway|Alan Aylward|Michael Burrell|Cayle Chernin|John Kerr|Michael Kukulewich|Barney Phillips|Al Rossi|William Wood
title: Dealing: Or the Berkeley-to-Boston Forty-Brick Lost-Bag Blues
